sqlMap.select:
select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT ,( case when master.zc_cg_leixing = 'Z01' then (select prj.proj_name from zc_eb_proj prj where prj.proj_code = master.zc_make_code) else (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) end ) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_bid_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type from ZC_XMCG_HT master
order by $orderByClause$

select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT , (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_bid_code as pack_name, ZC_XMCG_HT.proj_code, ZC_XMCG_HT.proj_name, ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_ht_type as pur_type from ZC_XMCG_HT ZC_XMCG_HT where 1=1
ZC_XMCG_HT.ND=#nd#
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is not null
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id) and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='cancel' and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='exec'
(ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS ='exec')
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
ZC_XMCG_HT.CO_CODE = #coCode#
ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS = #billStatus#
order by ZC_XMCG_HT.EXECUTE_DATE DESC

select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT , (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_zb_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type from ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER where MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_XMCG_HT (ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL,ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID,proj_code,proj_name) values (#zcHtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, #zcHtName:VARCHAR#, #zcHtType:VARCHAR#, #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:CHAR#, #zcSgnDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcSuName:VARCHAR#, #zcJckdlMc:VARCHAR#, #zcHtNum:DECIMAL#, #zcCzLevel:VARCHAR#, #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, #zcFukuanYued:VARCHAR#, #zcCheckType:VARCHAR#, #zcConText:VARCHAR#, #zcConTextBlobid:VARCHAR#, #zcHtStatus:VARCHAR#, #agency:VARCHAR#, #orgCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj1:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj2:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj3:VARCHAR#, #zcSmPj4:VARCHAR#, #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, #zcInputDate:TIMESTAMP#, #processInstId:DECIMAL#, #zcParhtCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuAccCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuBankCode:VARCHAR#, #zcSuBankName:VARCHAR#, #zcSuTel:VARCHAR#, #zcSuLinkman:VARCHAR#, #zcIsZxqyZb:VARCHAR#, #zcGnw:VARCHAR#, #zcSnw:VARCHAR#, #zcArriveAddr:VARCHAR#, #zcArriveDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, #zcIsrewrite:VARCHAR#, #zcCgLeixing:VARCHAR#, #zcZgCsName:VARCHAR#, #zcBgspBh:VARCHAR#,#zcDeliveryEvl:VARCHAR#,#zcPriceEvl:VARCHAR#, #zcQuantityEvl:VARCHAR#,#zcServiceEvl:VARCHAR#,#zcMemo:VARCHAR#,#zcBidContent:VARCHAR#,#zcDeliveryDate#,#zcDeliveryAddr#,#zcDeliveryType# , #zcProLimitStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcProLimitEndDate:TIMESTAMP#, #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#,#projCode:VARCHAR#,#projName:VARCHAR#)

ZC_SK_REN = #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#
ZC_ZB_NAME = #zcZbName:VARCHAR#
ZC_ZB_CODE = #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#
ZC_ISREWRITE = #zcIsrewrite:VARCHAR#
ZC_CG_LEIXING = #zcCgLeixing:VARCHAR#
ZC_ZG_CS_NAME = #zcZgCsName:VARCHAR#
ZC_BGSP_BH = #zcBgspBh:VARCHAR#
ZC_DELIVERY_EVL = #zcDeliveryEvl:VARCHAR#
ZC_PRICE_EVL = #zcPriceEvl:VARCHAR#
ZC_QUANTITY_EVL = #zcQuantityEvl:VARCHAR#
ZC_SERVICE_EVL = #zcServiceEvl:VARCHAR#
ZC_MEMO = #zcMemo:VARCHAR#
ZC_BID_CONTENT = #zcBidContent:VARCHAR#
ZC_DELIVERY_DATE = #zcDeliveryDate:VARCHAR#
ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR = #zcDeliveryAddr:VARCHAR#
ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE = #zcDeliveryType:VARCHAR#
where ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#

update ZC_XMCG_HT set ZC_DIYU_DAIMA = #zcDiyuDaima:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_NAME = #zcHtName:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_TYPE = #zcHtType:VARCHAR#, ZC_REQ_CODE = #zcReqCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_MAKE_CODE = #zcMakeCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BID_CODE = #zcBidCode:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, ND = #nd:CHAR#, ZC_SGN_DATE = #zcSgnDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_SU_NAME = #zcSuName:VARCHAR#, ZC_JCKDL_MC = #zcJckdlMc:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_NUM = #zcHtNum:DECIMAL#, ZC_CZ_LEVEL = #zcCzLevel:VARCHAR#, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE = #zcFukuanType:VARCHAR#, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED = #zcFukuanYued:VARCHAR#, ZC_CHECK_TYPE = #zcCheckType:VARCHAR#, ZC_CON_TEXT = #zcConText:VARCHAR#, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID = #zcConTextBlobid:VARCHAR#, ZC_HT_STATUS = #zcHtStatus:VARCHAR#, AGENCY = #agency:VARCHAR#, ORG_CODE = #orgCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SM_PJ1 = #zcSmPj1:VARCHAR#, ZC_SM_PJ2 = #zcSmPj2:VARCHAR#, ZC_SM_PJ3 = #zcSmPj3:VARCHAR#, ZC_SM_PJ4 = #zcSmPj4:VARCHAR#, EXECUTOR = #zcInputCode:VARCHAR#, EXECUTE_DATE = #zcInputDate:TIMESTAMP#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, ZC_PARHT_CODE = #zcParhtCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_CODE = #zcSuCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE = #zcSuAccCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE = #zcSuBankCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME = #zcSuBankName:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_TEL = #zcSuTel:VARCHAR#, ZC_SU_LINKMAN = #zcSuLinkman:VARCHAR#, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB = #zcIsZxqyZb:VARCHAR#, ZC_GNW = #zcGnw:VARCHAR#, ZC_SNW = #zcSnw:VARCHAR#, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR = #zcArriveAddr:VARCHAR#, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE = #zcArriveDate:TIMESTAMP#, ZC_HANGYE_CTG = #zcHangyeCtg:VARCHAR#, ZC_SK_REN = #zcSkRen:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_NAME = #zcZbName:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZB_CODE = #zcZbCode:VARCHAR#, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM = #zcBiNzjzSum:DECIMAL#, ZC_ISREWRITE = #zcIsrewrite:VARCHAR#, ZC_CG_LEIXING = #zcCgLeixing:VARCHAR#, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME = #zcZgCsName:VARCHAR#, ZC_BGSP_BH = #zcBgspBh:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_EVL = #zcDeliveryEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_PRICE_EVL = #zcPriceEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL = #zcQuantityEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_SERVICE_EVL = #zcServiceEvl:VARCHAR#, ZC_MEMO = #zcMemo:VARCHAR#, ZC_BID_CONTENT = #zcBidContent:VARCHAR#,
ZC_DELIVERY_DATE = #zcDeliveryDate:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR = #zcDeliveryAddr:VARCHAR#, ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE = #zcDeliveryType:VARCHAR#,
zc_imp_file = #zcImpFile:VARCHAR#, zc_imp_file_blobid = #zcImpFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, zc_pro_limit_start_date = #zcProLimitStartDate:TIMESTAMP#, zc_pro_limit_end_date = #zcProLimitEndDate:TIMESTAMP# where ZC_HT_CODE = #zcHtCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE ,(select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_bid_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type FROM ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER WHERE MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0:VARCHAR# AND MASTER.ZC_HT_STATUS='exec' AND (to_number(MASTER.Zc_Fukuan_Type) -(select count(*) from ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM_DTL dt,zc_ht_pre_pay_bill b where b.bill_code=dt.bill_code and b.status='exec' and dt.ht_code=MASTER.Zc_Ht_Code)=1)

select MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, MASTER.CO_CODE, MASTER.ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, MASTER.ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, MASTER.EXECUTOR, MASTER.EXECUTE_DATE, MASTER.PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE ,(select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, MASTER.ZC_IMP_FILE, MASTER.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_bid_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type FROM ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER WHERE MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0:VARCHAR# AND MASTER.ZC_HT_STATUS='exec' and MASTER.Zc_Ht_Num - nvl((select sum(bal.zc_bal_sum) from zc_p_pro_bal bal where bal.zc_ht_code = MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE), 0 ) > 0

select ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_BID_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.CO_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ND, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS, ZC_XMCG_HT.AGENCY, ZC_XMCG_HT.ORG_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SM_PJ4, ZC_XMCG_HT.EXECUTOR, ZC_XMCG_HT.EXECUTE_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SU_CODE, s.zc_su_acc_code ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, s.zc_su_bank_code ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, s.zc_su_bank_name ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_GNW, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SNW, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SK_REN, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_BGSP_BH, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_DELIVERY_EVL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_QUANTITY_EVL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SERVICE_EVL, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_MEMO, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_BID_CONTENT, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_DELIVERY_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE, (select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME, (select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_bid_code as pack_name, ZC_XMCG_HT.proj_code, ZC_XMCG_HT.proj_name, ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_ht_type as pur_type, ZC_XMCG_HT.Zc_Ht_Num-nvl(pay.payedSum,0) as canPaySum FROM ZC_XMCG_HT ZC_XMCG_HT,zc_b_supplier s, (select b.zc_ht_code,sum(b.zc_bal_sum) as payedSum from zc_p_pro_bal b where b.zc_bal_status!='cancel' group by b.zc_ht_code ) pay WHERE ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS = 'exec' and ZC_XMCG_HT.Zc_Su_Code=s.zc_su_code and ZC_XMCG_HT.Zc_Ht_Code=pay.zc_ht_code(+)
ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_SU_CODE=#zcText0#
ZC_XMCG_HT.CO_CODE=#coCode#

select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT,ZC_DELIVERY_DATE, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE ,(select m.ZC_MAKE_NAME from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM from ZC_P_PRO_MAKE m where m.zc_make_code = master.zc_make_code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_bid_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type FROM ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER WHERE MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE=#zcText0:VARCHAR# AND MASTER.ZC_HT_STATUS='exec' AND (to_number(MASTER.Zc_Fukuan_Type) -(select count(*) from ZC_HT_PRE_PAY_BILL_ITEM_DTL dt where dt.ht_code=MASTER.Zc_Ht_Code)>1)

select (select AS_FILE.FILE_CONTENT from AS_FILE where AS_FILE.FILE_ID = ZC_EB_BULLETIN_WORD_MOLD.FILE_ID ) as FILE_CONTENT from ZC_EB_BULLETIN_WORD_MOLD where BULLETIN_MOLD_TYPE = 'HT' and STATUS = '2'
select AS_FILE.FILE_CONTENT from AS_FILE where AS_FILE.FILE_ID = #value#
select c.CO_NAME from as_company c where c.CO_CODE = #value# and c.nd = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')
select sup.sup_emp_code from as_wf_business_superior sup where sup.sup_condition like '%ZC_P_PRO_MAKE_XY.%$CO_CODE$%' and sup.nd = #ND# and sup.jun_posi_code = #ROLE_CODE#

select tt.sup_emp_code from as_wf_business_superior tt where (tt.sup_condition like '%ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.CO_CODE%$CO_CODE$%' or tt.sup_condition like '%ZC_P_PRO_MAKE.ORG_CODE%$csbh$%' ) and tt.jun_posi_code = #ysdwfz# AND ROWNUM =1 AND tt.ND = #ND#
select OP.OPT_VAL from as_option OP where OP.OPT_ID = #value#

select ee.emp_code from as_emp_position ee where ee.nd = #ND#
ee.posi_code = #POSI_CODE#
ee.ORG_CODE = #ORG_CODE#
select count(*) cnt from wf_task_executor taw where taw.instance_id = #instance_id# and taw.executor = #executor#
SELECT DISTINCT AGENCY,ORG_CODE FROM SELECT_PROJECT_FOR_CONTRACT_V WHERE ZC_MAKE_CODE= #zcMakeCode#
select zc_ht_code,zc_ht_name,zc_ht_num,nd,ZC_SU_NAME from zc_xmcg_ht ht where ht.zc_make_code = #zcMakeCode# and ht.zc_parht_code is null and ht.zc_ht_status='exec'
select zc_ht_code,zc_ht_name,zc_ht_num,nd,ZC_SU_NAME from zc_xmcg_ht ht where ht.co_code = #coCode# and ht.nd=#nd# and ht.zc_parht_code is null and ht.zc_ht_status='exec'

select ZC_HT_CODE, MASTER.ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, MASTER.ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, master.CO_CODE, master.ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, MASTER.ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, MASTER.AGENCY, MASTER.ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, MASTER.EXECUTOR, MASTER.EXECUTE_DATE, MASTER.PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH, ZC_DELIVERY_EVL, ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL, ZC_SERVICE_EVL, ZC_MEMO, ZC_BID_CONTENT, ZC_BID_CONTENT as ZC_MAKE_NAME, p.pack_budget as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE, ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR, ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, MASTER.ZC_IMP_FILE, MASTER.ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, p.pack_name, vp.PUR_TYPE, e.zc_make_linkman lxr, master.proj_code, master.proj_name from ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER, zc_eb_pack p, zc_v_pro_pack vp, zc_eb_entrust e where master.zc_bid_code = p.pack_code and master.proj_code = p.proj_code and master.zc_bid_code = vp.pack_code and p.entrust_code = e.sn and MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE = #value#

select e.zc_make_code entrust_code, p.pack_code pack_code, s.zc_su_addr zc_su_addr,s.zc_post_code zc_post_code,s.zc_su_linkman,decode(s.zc_su_tel,'', s.LINK_MAN_PHONE, s.zc_su_tel) zc_su_tel, s.zc_su_bank_name zc_su_bank_name,s.zc_su_acc_code zc_su_acc_code,p.proj_code zb_file_code from zc_eb_pack p,zc_eb_eval_report r,zc_b_supplier s,zc_eb_entrust e where p.pack_code = #packCode# and p.proj_code=#projCode# and p.pack_code=r.pack_code and r.provider_code=s.zc_su_code and p.entrust_code=e.sn

select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT ,ZC_BID_CONTENT as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,(select m.pack_budget from Zc_Eb_Pack m where m.pack_code=ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_bid_code and m.proj_code=ZC_XMCG_HT.Zc_Make_Code) as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, (select m.pack_name from Zc_Eb_Pack m where m.pack_code=ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_bid_code and m.proj_code=ZC_XMCG_HT.Zc_Make_Code) pack_name,
ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_TYPE PUR_TYPE, '' lxr, ZC_XMCG_HT.PROJ_CODE, ZC_XMCG_HT.PROJ_NAME from ZC_XMCG_HT ZC_XMCG_HT where 1=1
ZC_XMCG_HT.ND=#nd#
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is null
ZC_XMCG_HT.zc_parht_code is not null
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id) and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='cancel' and ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS!='exec'
(ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS ='exec')
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_XMCG_HT.process_inst_id)
1=1
ZC_XMCG_HT.CO_CODE = #coCode#
ZC_XMCG_HT.ZC_HT_STATUS = #billStatus#
order by ZC_XMCG_HT.EXECUTE_DATE DESC

select ZC_HT_CODE, ZC_DIYU_DAIMA, ZC_HT_NAME, ZC_HT_TYPE, ZC_REQ_CODE, (select e.zc_make_code from zc_eb_entrust e,zc_eb_pack p where e.sn=p.entrust_code and p.pack_code=MASTER.ZC_BID_CODE) ZC_MAKE_CODE, ZC_BID_CODE, CO_CODE, ND, ZC_SGN_DATE, ZC_SU_NAME, ZC_JCKDL_MC, ZC_HT_NUM, ZC_CZ_LEVEL, ZC_FUKUAN_TYPE, ZC_FUKUAN_YUED, ZC_CHECK_TYPE, ZC_CON_TEXT, ZC_CON_TEXT_BLOBID, '0' ZC_HT_STATUS, AGENCY, ORG_CODE, ZC_SM_PJ1, ZC_SM_PJ2, ZC_SM_PJ3, ZC_SM_PJ4, EXECUTOR, EXECUTE_DATE, null PROCESS_INST_ID, ZC_PARHT_CODE, ZC_SU_CODE, ZC_SU_ACC_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_CODE, ZC_SU_BANK_NAME, ZC_SU_TEL, ZC_SU_LINKMAN, ZC_IS_ZXQY_ZB, ZC_GNW, ZC_SNW, ZC_ARRIVE_ADDR, ZC_ARRIVE_DATE, ZC_HANGYE_CTG, ZC_SK_REN, ZC_ZB_NAME, ZC_ZB_CODE, ZC_BI_NZJZ_SUM, ZC_ISREWRITE, ZC_CG_LEIXING, ZC_ZG_CS_NAME, ZC_BGSP_BH,ZC_DELIVERY_EVL,ZC_PRICE_EVL, ZC_QUANTITY_EVL,ZC_SERVICE_EVL,ZC_MEMO,ZC_BID_CONTENT ,'' as ZC_MAKE_NAME ,'' as ZC_MONEY_BI_SUM, ZC_DELIVERY_DATE,ZC_DELIVERY_ADDR,ZC_DELIVERY_TYPE , ZC_PRO_LIMIT_START_DATE, ZC_PRO_LIMIT_END_DATE, ZC_IMP_FILE, ZC_IMP_FILE_BLOBID, master.zc_bid_code as pack_name, master.proj_code, master.proj_name, MASTER.zc_ht_type as pur_type from ZC_XMCG_HT MASTER where MASTER.ZC_HT_CODE in ($value$)
select count(*) from zc_xmcg_ht where zc_bid_code=#value#
